channel.title: How to add 10x multiplier
channel.description:
how do you add thr 10x damage multiplier
need the code for it also if anyone has it.

item.title: How to add 10x multiplier
item.dc:creator: @MelStone MelStone
item.description:
@MelStone wrote:

[quote=“redemption0, post:10, topic:444083”][quote author=xknightpk link=topic=546766.msg4008641#msg4008641 date=1338927621]

Um delta doesn’t have the 10x multiplier for damage if you have coded PI 317’s

its a 317 pi with 600+ data in it.

E: i just dont remember the code which im sure i can look up but not sure where exactly it goes.

PI, really? There’s like thousands of tutorials.

client.java find:

Change False to True, Like this

CLIENT SIDED.
step 1:
open class30_sub2_sub4_sub1

step2: replace your method447 with this one

[code=c]public final void method447(int i, int j, int k, int l)
{
for(int i1 = 0; i1 < 4; i1++)
if(anIntArray1516[i1] <= l)
{
anIntArray1514[i1] = k * ((client.newDamage == true && k > 0) ? 10 : 1);
if (client.newDamage && k > 0) {
anIntArray1514[i1] += new java.util.Random().nextInt(9);
}
anIntArray1515[i1] = j;
anIntArray1516[i1] = l + 70;
return;
}

if(i != anInt1509)
aBoolean1508 = !aBoolean1508;
}
[/code]
Compile and Done.
Enjoy 10x Hits.
[/quote]

method447 doesnt exist in it.[/quote]
couldn’t you just make a method447?

Read full topic

step 1:

step2: replace your method447 with this one

[code=c]public final void method447(int i, int j, int k, int l)

for(int i1 = 0; i1 < 4; i1++)
if(anIntArray1516[i1] <= l)
{
anIntArray1514[i1] = k * ((client.newDamage == true && k > 0) ? 10 : 1);
if (client.newDamage && k > 0) {
anIntArray1514[i1] += new java.util.Random().nextInt(9);
}
anIntArray1515[i1] = j;
anIntArray1516[i1] = l + 70;
return;
}

if(i != anInt1509)
aBoolean1508 = !aBoolean1508;
}
[/code]
Compile and Done.
Enjoy 10x Hits.[/quote]

method447 doesnt exist in it.

item.title: How to add 10x multiplier
item.dc:creator: @MelStone MelStone
item.description:
@MelStone wrote:

[quote=“xknightpk, post:8, topic:444083”][quote author=MelStone link=topic=546766.msg4008645#msg4008645 date=1338927730]
Why would you get a 317 with 600+ data in it?
OT: it could be in the client.java folder, might be in player.java I remember I just had to make a false statement to a true statement to get 10x hits to work…
[/quote]

You’re right! :P[/quote]
Quite easy if you look around in your files that you use all the time and search for something that relates to what you want to change

Read full topic

its a 317 pi with 600+ data in it.

E: i just dont remember the code which im sure i can look up but not sure where exactly it goes.[/quote]

PI, really? There’s like thousands of tutorials.

client.java find:

Change False to True, Like this

CLIENT SIDED.
step 1:
open class30_sub2_sub4_sub1

step2: replace your method447 with this one

[code=c]public final void method447(int i, int j, int k, int l)
{
for(int i1 = 0; i1 < 4; i1++)
if(anIntArray1516[i1] <= l)
{
anIntArray1514[i1] = k * ((client.newDamage == true && k > 0) ? 10 : 1);

anIntArray1514[i1] += new java.util.Random().nextInt(9);

anIntArray1515[i1] = j;
anIntArray1516[i1] = l + 70;
return;

if(i != anInt1509)
aBoolean1508 = !aBoolean1508;

@dawwn wrote:

redemption0:

lololol if you have no clue what im talking about please dont post

Besides, we know what you mean, nobody is going to spoon feed you & give you the codes that easy.

Edit: I would help, just what base?
